alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 03 at 3:33AM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch and total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of West Tennessee. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dyer; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Shelby; Tipton
